sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; function DesignOfCircularityForm() { const [showCircularityForm, setShowCircularityForm] = useState(false); const [showBatteryForm, setShowBatteryForm] = useState(false); const [showRecycledContentForm, setShowRecycledContentForm] = useState(false); const toggleCircularityForm = () => { setShowCircularityForm(!showCircularityForm); }; const toggleBatteryForm = () => { setShowBatteryForm(!showBatteryForm); }; const toggleRecycledContentForm = () => { setShowRecycledContentForm(!showRecycledContentForm); }; const toggleEndofLifeinformationForm = () => { setShowEndofLifeinformationForm(!showEndofLifeinformationForm); }; const buttonClass = "bg-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-500 text-white font-bold p-1 rounded-full w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center"; return (

Design of Circularity

{showCircularityForm && (
Information Description
Postal address of sources for spare parts 123 Battery Street, Cityville, USA
E-mail address of sources for spare parts spareparts@batteryco.com
Web address of sources for spare parts www.batteryco.com/spareparts
Part numbers for components Component A: BP-1234 Component B: BP-5678 Component C: BP-9012
)}

Battery Safety Requirements

{showBatteryForm && (
Information Description
Extinguishing agent Use CO2 or dry chemical extinguisher
Safety measures/instructions 1. Avoid exposure to open flames 2. Store in a cool and dry place
)}

Recycled and Renewable Content

{showRecycledContentForm && (
Information Description
Pre-consumer recycled nickel share 10%
Pre-consumer recycled cobalt share 5%
Pre-consumer recycled lithium share 15%
Pre-consumer recycled lead share 8%
Post-consumer recycled nickel share 12%
Post-consumer recycled cobalt share 7%
Post-consumer recycled lithium share 18%
Post-consumer recycled lead share 10%
Renewable content share 20%
)}

End-of-Life information

{showEndofLifeinformationForm && (
Information Description
Role of end-users in contributing to waste prevention Use CO2 or dry chemical extinguisher
Role of end- users in contributing to the separate collection of waste batteries 1. Avoid exposure to open flames 2. Store in a cool and dry place
Information on separate collection, take back, collection points and preparing for re-use, preparing for repurposing and recycling operations 1. Avoid exposure to open flames 2. Store in a cool and dry place
)}
); } export default DesignOfCircularityForm;
